title: The Institute (2017 Thriller) Outsmart the system… or become its puppet | A James Franco film

sources.title: The Institute (2017 Thriller) Outsmart the system… or become its puppet | A James Franco film
sources.description:
Isabel Porter’s grief lands her in the Rosewood Institute’s clutches, where Dr. Cairn’s "experimental therapies" morph into a sinister game of psychological puppetry. When the institute’s twisted cabal pushes too far, Isabel weaponizes their mind-bending tactics, orchestrating a razor-edged escape to expose their macabre machinations, or else be forever lost.

Original title: The Institute 

Director: James Franco, Pamela Romanowsky
Writers: Adam Rager, Matt Rager

Main cast:
Allie Gallerani — Isabel Porter
James Franco — Dr. Cairn
Tim Blake Nelson — Dr. Lemelle
Lori Singer — Madame Werner
Josh Duhamel — Detective
Eric Roberts — Dr. Torrington
Gabrielle Haugh — Allison
Scott Haze — Gunther
Topher Grace — Vincent

Genres: Horror, Thriller, Mystery
Release date: March 3, 2017 
Filming location: Maryland, USA

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics
